name: Form Familiar
description: Summons forth a familiar from the caster's heart to fight beside them.

name: Gateway
description: Opens up a doorway that transports the caster between worlds.

name: Healing Touch
description: Heals wounds with a warm rush of kindheartedness.

name: Draw Poison
description: Cures those whose health is being sapped by poison.
effect: Cure a single ally of poison.

name: Healing Hand
description: Completely heals even the gravest of wounds.
effect: Completely restore a single ally's HP.

name: Take Heart
description: Liberates some of a consenting subject's emotional essence.

name: Give Heart
description: Restores balance to broken hearts.

name: Spring Lock
description: Encourages that which is shut tight to open. Does not work on human hearts.

name: Travel
description: Transports the caster instantaneously to a location they have visited before.

name: Levitate
description: Gently lifts the caster off the ground for a short period of time.

name: Second Self
description: Creates a short-lived doppelganger of the caster.

name: Vanish
description: Causes the caster to become invisible to the naked eye. Useful for hiding.

name: Chart Chests
description: Reveals the whereabouts of nearby treasure chests in enclosed locations.

name: Veil
description: Masks the caster's scent, preventing detection by the creatures of the wild.

name: Magic Lamp
description: Makes what is dark light—if only for a short while.

name: Nature's Tongue
description: Enables the caster to speak to animals and plants, and even to enlist their aid.

name: Quicken Growth
description: Speeds the growth of plants, but shortens their lives.

name: Mimic
description: Grants the caster the ability to imitate any voice, be it that of man, woman, or child.

name: Vacate
description: Plucks the caster from the depths of even the most dangerous place in an instant.

name: Seek Fortune
description: Reveals the whereabouts of nearby treasure chests in the great outdoors.

name: Rejuvenate
description: Rewinds time for an object, restoring it to its former glory.

name: Fuse
description: Enables the creation of certain items that cannot be cooked up in a cauldron.

name: Breach Time
description: Transports the caster to a desired point in time.\nCan only be used once in a lifetime.

name: Ward
description: Protects the caster from magical attacks, reducing the damage sustained from spells and tricks.

name: Nix
description: Allows accomplished wizards to prevent opponents from using magic.
effect: Prevent an enemy from using magic.

name: Secret Ingredient
description: Conjures up cuisine with a truly magical taste.

name: Loaf Of Life
description: Produces emergency rations in times of direst need.

name: Bridge
description: Builds magical bridges over rivers and chasms where none previously existed.

name: Spirit Medium
description: Allows the caster to speak to the spirits of the departed—both good and evil.

name: Puppet String
description: Enables the caster to manipulate statues and other objects as if they had a life of their own.

name: Insight
description: Gives the caster an insight into the past of a well-loved object and its owner.

name: Open Mind
description: Channels the caster's concern for a troubled soul to render their thoughts audible.

name: Burden
description: Weighs down certain subjects, slowing their movement.

name: Fortune's Fool
description: Entrusts the caster's fate to a higher power. Who knows what might happen?

name: Fortune's Fool
effect: A boulder falls out of nowhere!

name: Shift Shape
description: Allows the caster to assume the shape of another life-form, also granting the use of its abilities.

name: Shrink
description: Causes the caster to become tiny. Recasting the spell will reverse its effects.

name: Werecat
description: Transforms the caster into a cat, offering an insight into the essence of felinity.

name: Werefish
description: Transforms the caster into a fish, granting an understanding of the language of the deep.

name: Cloudburst
description: Causes a driving rain to fall, as if the very heavens had opened.
effect: Damage and possibly nix all enemies.

name: Thunder<->storm
description: Summons a violent storm that deals great damage to the enemy.

name: Fireball
description: Sends forth a ball of fire to scorch the enemy.\nCan also be used to light lanterns.
effect: Damage a single enemy with fire.

name: Pulse
description: Emits a wave of energy that damages enemies, and can also move distant objects.

name: Frostbite
description: Freezes enemies and objects solid. Can also be used to extinguish fires.
effect: Damage a single enemy with ice.

name: Arrow Of Light
description: Looses a high-speed bolt of light that is said to be powerful enough to exorcise demons.
effect: Damage a single enemy with light.

name: Unleash
description: Calls forth beings of great power to aid the caster. Requires considerable mental strength.

name: Windfall
effect: Deal storm damage to nearby enemies.

name: Everblade
effect: Deal physical damage to a single enemy.

name: Devastation
effect: Deal physical damage to all enemies.

name: Volcanic Roar
effect: Deal fire damage to all enemies.

name: Bolt From The Blue
effect: Deal storm damage to all enemies.

name: Howling Blizzard
effect: Deal water damage to all enemies.

name: Evenstar
description: Summons forth calamity and darkness, plunging all into despair.

name: Astra
description: A spell whose name exists only in legend, and which only the most legendary of wands can cast.

name: Quake
description: Shakes the earth with a violent tremor, damaging enemies, and even toppling buildings.
effect: Damage all enemies with a tremor.

name: Poison Apple
description: Creates a poisoned apple that induces a death-like state when eaten.

name: Broom Broom
description: Breathes life into brooms, cloud sweepers, and other brush-like objects.

name: Ashes Of Resurrection
description: Brings the dead back to life, but at great cost. The use of this spell is forbidden.

name: Mornstar
description: Sends spheres of light to scourge wrong-doers. The eponymous spell of the legendary wand.
effect: Damage a single enemy with light.

name: Fallen Star
description: Fallen Star

name: Nix
description: Nix

name: Ashes Of Resurrection
description: Ashes of Resurrection
